text: Has anyone implemented the google maps / hubl solution that also does a search based upon zip code or any location?   <http://bit.ly/2bxd3HG>
You’d need to use a geolocation API to translate the zip code/text location to coordinates, then you can search hubdb by location
thats what I got so far, didn't think it would be difficult to do, either
<@U22PJPGK0> are there any plans for HubDB to support multi select columns.

we’ve thought about it. It was even in my developer day presentation as a future addition, but we haven’t prioritized yet it. It helps to know when folks want it. I think this is the first time someone’s mentioned it. So no timeline yet, but it’s on our radar.
<@U2H3TT8F2> I'm with you. Multi Select would be huge for "tags" etc. <@U22PJPGK0> +1 for me too
